events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but want to request a refund as it doesn't fit me at all and I am very disappointed with the size.
The case is categorized under 'Refund' as the customer is requesting their money back due to sizing issues.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request to assist the customer with the return process.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket. I'll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed so I can proceed with the refund policy check?
Thank you, Sarah. My order number is 123456789. The jacket has never been worn or washed; I just tried it on once and realized it’s too large.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back with the original tags attached. I will provide you the return shipping label via email.
That sounds great, Sarah. I appreciate the quick response and the clear return instructions. I'll prepare the jacket for shipping right away.
The refund process was set up successfully. Return label has been sent. Please let us know once the jacket is shipped so we can complete your refund promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and to ask if you have shipped the jacket back for the refund processing.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday and have the tracking number. Thank you again for your assistance throughout this process.
The refund has been issued successfully to your original payment method. Please check your account within 3-5 business days.
We’ve sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please share your feedback about the refund process at your convenience.
Completed the survey and rated the support experience highly. Appreciate the prompt and helpful service throughout my refund request.
The refund case has been formally closed following successful resolution and positive customer feedback.
